item.title: Hello Ghostty
item.description:
Why do we want intelligent terminals when there are so many stupid users?

!

From the start of my computer journey, I always be a fan of terminals, they always amaze me and when I use them, it always feels like a Hackerman , opening neofetch and htop in front of my friend and cousins, fells really cool and they assume that I know some kind of advance computing and hacking. I used a lot of terminal emulator’s from the native one in MacOS and Linux to terminator, iTerm2, hyper, warp and from these many year’s, hopping from one to another, I didn’t able to find one, that really fit for my work. Last year I discovered Zellij which is not originally a terminal emulator’s but a terminal workspace , I liked it a lot, and start using it. But it always felt overkilled for me, I didn’t use it’s 10% of the features in my daily workflow. And sometimes it’s feels too complex to use, plus configuring it is not my cup of tea ðŸ«–.
